Paragraph: This result suggests that the introduction of the flat perylene structure to PFDTBT and PFD2TBT plays an important role in increasing the carrier mobility , possibly due to the enhanced interchain π-π interaction.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT |
| PFD2TBT |
| perylene structure |

Note that "perylene structure" is not a specific material name, but rather a descriptive term used to refer to the flat structure of the molecule.
